```r
library(kableExtra)
#Cong Target vs. Incong Target ERS OA Stats
options(scipen=999)
dataOATargetERS$Condition<-as.factor(dataOATargetERS$Condition)

### Estimate 1 = cong, Estimate 2 = incong
dataOATargetERStbl<-dataOATargetERS %>% 
  group_by(ROI) %>% 
  do(tidy(t.test(dissimCorr~Condition, data=.))) %>%                                   
  mutate_if(is.numeric, ~round(., 3)) %>% #Round variables to the fourth decimal, and
  select(1,3:6,8:10) 

#Manually rename columns for ease of readability
names(dataOATargetERStbl)[2] <- \dissimCorrCongAvg\"

column1: ggtitle(\"OA Cong Target v Incong Target\n Encoding-Retrieval Dissimilarity\") +
